name: io.github.integromat/make-mcp-server
description: A Model Context Protocol server that enables Make scenarios to be utilized as tools by AI assistants. This integration allows AI systems to trigger and interact with your Make automation workflows.

environment_variables.name: MAKE_API_KEY
environment_variables.description: API key for Make with scenarios:read and scenarios:run scopes

environment_variables.name: MAKE_ZONE
environment_variables.description: The zone your organization is hosted in (e.g., eu2.make.com)

environment_variables.name: MAKE_TEAM
environment_variables.description: The Team ID found in the URL of the Team page
